tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.7

  • Changelog

Fetch datasets from given database

Source: R/fetch.R
fetch.Rd

Based on a template query file and "where clause" configuration, datasets are extracted from a given database.

fetch(query_file, config_where = NULL, dsn = "iquizoo-v3", encoding = "utf-8")

fetch_single_game(query_file, game_id, config_where = NULL, ...)

Arguments

query_file

File name of sql query
config_where

Configuration of "where-clause" of the sql query. Can be a list (mostly from the config.yml file) or data.frame.
dsn

The data source name of an ODBC database connector. See odbc::dbConnect() for more information.
encoding

Encoding to be assumed for input strings. Default to "UTF-8".
game_id

The identifier of the game to fetch datasets from.
...

Other arguments passed to fetch().

Value

A tibble of the fetched data.

Functions

  • fetch: Default usage of fetch.

  • fetch_single_game: A special case to fetch datasets from a single game.

Author

Liang Zhang
